INPUT[inlineSelect(
  option(Dive Bar),
  option(Roadside Stop),
  option(Common Room),
  option(Smoke Den),
  option(Brewpub),
  option(Festhall),
  option(Inn-Tavern),
  option(Noble Lounge),
  option(Private Club)
)]

inputFieldTemplates.name: LodgingType
inputFieldTemplates.declaration:
INPUT[inlineSelect(
  option(None),
  option(Common Bunkroom),
  option(Rough Cot),
  option(Standard Room),
  option(Private Room),
  option(Luxury Suite),
  option(Regal Quarters),
  option(Arcane Sanctum),
  option(Ethereal Resting Chamber)
)]

inputFieldTemplates.name: OrganizationScope
inputFieldTemplates.declaration:

  option(Global),
  option(Local),
  option(Neighborhood),
  option(National),
  option(Nomadic),

)]

inputFieldTemplates.name: OrganizationStatus
inputFieldTemplates.declaration:
INPUT[inlineSelect(
  option(✅ Active),
  option(🛑 Disbanded),
  option(💥 Destroyed),
  option(⏸️ Inactive),
  option(🔀 Merged),
  option(🕳️ Underground)
)]

inputFieldTemplates.name: Attributes
inputFieldTemplates.declaration: INPUT[inlineListSuggester(option(Strength), option(Dexterity), option(Constitution), option(Intelligence), option(Wisdom), option(Charisma))]

)]

inputFieldTemplates.name: Sanctification
inputFieldTemplates.declaration: INPUT[inlineListSuggester(option(None), option(Can Choose Holy), option(Must Choose Holy), option(Can Choose Holy), option(Must Choose Unholy), option(Can Choose Holy or Unholy))]

inputFieldTemplates.name: Font
inputFieldTemplates.declaration: INPUT[inlineSelect(option(Heal), option(Harm), option(Heal or Harm))]
